columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the cluster.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The ID of the cluster.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The type of the cluster.

columns.name: location
columns.description: The location where the cluster is created.

columns.name: azure_portal_fqdn
columns.description: FQDN for the master pool which used by proxy config.

columns.name: disk_encryption_set_id
columns.description: ResourceId of the disk encryption set to use for enabling encryption at rest.

columns.name: dns_prefix
columns.description: DNS prefix specified when creating the managed cluster.

columns.name: enable_pod_security_policy
columns.description: Whether to enable Kubernetes pod security policy (preview).

columns.name: enable_rbac
columns.description: Whether to enable Kubernetes Role-Based Access Control.

columns.name: fqdn
columns.description: FQDN for the master pool.

columns.name: fqdn_subdomain
columns.description: FQDN subdomain specified when creating private cluster with custom private dns zone.

columns.name: kubernetes_version
columns.description: Version of Kubernetes specified when creating the managed cluster.

columns.name: max_agent_pools
columns.description: The max number of agent pools for the managed cluster.

columns.name: node_resource_group
columns.description: Name of the resource group containing agent pool nodes.

columns.name: private_fqdn
columns.description: FQDN of private cluster.

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: The current deployment or provisioning state.

columns.name: aad_profile
columns.description: Profile of Azure Active Directory configuration.

columns.name: addon_profiles
columns.description: Profile of managed cluster add-on.

columns.name: agent_pool_profiles
columns.description: Properties of the agent pool.

columns.name: api_server_access_profile
columns.description: Access profile for managed cluster API server.

columns.name: auto_scaler_profile
columns.description: Parameters to be applied to the cluster-autoscaler when enabled.

columns.name: auto_upgrade_profile
columns.description: Profile of auto upgrade configuration.

columns.name: identity
columns.description: The identity of the managed cluster, if configured.

columns.name: identity_profile
columns.description: Identities associated with the cluster.

columns.name: linux_profile
columns.description: Profile for Linux VMs in the container service cluster.

columns.name: network_profile
columns.description: Profile of network configuration.

columns.name: pod_identity_profile
columns.description: Profile of managed cluster pod identity.

columns.name: power_state
columns.description: Represents the Power State of the cluster.

columns.name: service_principal_profile
columns.description: Information about a service principal identity for the cluster to use for manipulating Azure APIs.

columns.name: sku
columns.description: The managed cluster SKU.

columns.name: windows_profile
columns.description: Profile for Windows VMs in the container service cluster.

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tags
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTags

columns.name: region
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionRegion
